title: HedgeFx
author: HedgeFx
created_time: April 05, 2023, 03:21:25 PMLast edit: April 05, 2023, 04:04:23 PM by HedgeFx
content: Hallo,Last week , for first time since i was there, i was accepted in a signature campaign - Yo!Mix - ( Royse777 as campaign manager). On April 1 i received my payement , but according to spreadhet ( https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SLhz6zEmBSrlZ0wNJDMvKI5vOgBZzVjG8b9FlXpn-oQ/edit#gid=659935963 ) a was overpaid for 0.00100558 BTC . I was accepted in another campaign, so From April 3 i left YoMIX signature campaign.So i contacted Royse77 and ask him address for refund my overdue. I made this post for confirm my refund of 0.00100558 BTC to bc1qslulwgj4azme73lsfmxgs9d8u66sm48a788xegk83lyayklzh6wqcj4a66 ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434037.msg61576821#msg61576821 ) that was also confirmed me by pm from Royse777 .Here TRXID: https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/ae20026f9b6a61d3199459d3f5b17de28456dd14487fae9593447da2fee6b202@Royse777 please confirm receipt!

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Why create a thread on the reputation board when this can be done via PM or discussion on his telegram channel?So it doesn't need to be a publication because it's not a big deal.I know Royse777 made a bit of a mistake by overpaying you and underpaying me, but from the spreadsheet colomn it was clear it would be paid next week.Maybe more so you should lock the thread and Royse can confirm in PM.

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on April 05, 2023, 03:49:12 PMWhy create a thread on the reputation board when this can be done via PM or discussion on his telegram channel?So it doesn't need to be a publication because it's not a big deal.I know Royse777 made a bit of a mistake by overpaying you and underpaying me, but from the spreadsheet colomn it was clear it would be paid next week.Maybe more so you should lock the thread and Royse can confirm in PM.Because since it is a sort of debt that I have and which is made public through the payment campaign spreadsheet, it is correct that traces of the payment remain in this section of the forum.Obviously the tread will be closed as soon as the campaign manager confirms that everything is ok.

comments.author: Bobrox
comments.body: Its seems not necessary creating this thread but I am respect with your honest refund with overpaid payment on YoMix signature campaign, due rule you left this campaign should refund but if not left @Royse777 campaign maybe your next week payment cut off based on how much overpaid received.Could be other motivate when Bounty Manager give overpaid payment but have initiative refund it, right now not all person are honest actually when receiving overpaid payment in signature campaign. When joining altcoin bounty ever received double payment and I contacted with Bounty Manager for refunding to their wallet.

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Quote from: Bobrox on April 05, 2023, 04:04:51 PMIts seems not necessary creating this thread but I am respect with your honest refund with overpaid payment on YoMix signature campaign, due rule you left this campaign should refund but if not left @Royse777 campaign maybe your next week payment cut off based on how much overpaid received.New sig campaign manager is not Â Royse777. I expect no other payments from the old sig. campaign.I think that by opening this tread I haven't done anything wrong: this board exists precisely to resolve these situations.
